Package cs2030.simulator

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Statistics
  • class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an immutable class that stores stats about the simulation. In particular, the average * waiting time, the number of customer who left, and the number of customers who are served, are stored.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int totalNumOfLostCustomer
      Total number of customers who left without being served.
      private int totalNumOfServedCustomer
      Total number of customers who were served.
      private double totalWaitingTime
      Sum of time spent waiting for all customers.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return a string representation of the staistics collected.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string containing three numbers: the average waiting time, followed by the number of served customer, followed by the number of lost customer.
